LanguageData.FuelSettingsNote: Fuel List: Select what should be considered fuel. Notes: 1. Deselecting any resource normally used by a building (e.g. wood logs for the campfire) will disable that building's fuel tab, and it will revert to using only their original fuel. 2. The Pod Laucher and any other building that allows for fuel level adjustment are also excluded. 3. Fuel units are always the same for any resource: 1 unit = 1 fuel.
